Body: My screen is broken. When I try to turn it off to go to recovery my device just restarts.I can't turn off my device to get to recovery mode by long pressing the off button it just restarts. I tried to use ultimate touchscreen for android so I can access it, but unfortunately it needs USB debugging.I have an Android 4.4 kitkat device and it has support for sending and accepting files through a usb cable, but no blutooth support, and has WiFi support.So how can I turn on USB debugging?
